purpose: The email announces the call for papers for workshops at the ISSRE 2025 conference, which will take place from October 21-24, 2025, in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil. It provides details about the workshops, their focus on software reliability, and important deadlines for paper submissions. The email also lists confirmed workshops and their respective links for more information.
evidence_sentences: Workshops at ISSRE provide additional opportunities for collaborating and exchanging information, for both practitioners from industry and academic researchers.
The following workshops are confirmed and will be co-located with ISSRE 2025:
- Workshop paper notification to authors: August 11th, 2025
